paramInformation.label: Device Status
paramInformation.description: How to control the relay

paramInformation.label: Device Status Upon Receipt of A Basic Set Command
Overcurrent Time
paramInformation.description: Sets the time to recognize an overcurrent event.

paramInformation.label: Next State
paramInformation.description: Defines the next state if an overcurrent event occur

paramInformation.label: Meter Reset
paramInformation.description: Provides total operating time from last meter reset

paramInformation.label: Energy Flow
paramInformation.description: Determines whether if energy consumed or energy produced.

paramInformation.label: UP Power Level
paramInformation.description: Sets the level of instantaneous power in Watts

paramInformation.label: UP Power Time
paramInformation.description: Sets the time in seconds

paramInformation.label: UP Power State
paramInformation.description: Defines the next status case of a UP Power event

paramInformation.label: UP Power Associated
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of Group 2 devices. Allowable range: 0-99, 255

paramInformation.label: DOWN Power Level
paramInformation.description: Sets the level of instantaneous power in Watts

paramInformation.label: DOWN Power Time
paramInformation.description: Sets the time in seconds

paramInformation.label: DOWN Power State
paramInformation.description: Defines the next state case of a DOWN Power event

paramInformation.label: DOWN Power Associated
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of Group 3 devices. Allowable range: 0-99, 255

paramInformation.label: Energy Level
paramInformation.description: Sets the energy level in KWh

paramInformation.label: Energy Limit State
paramInformation.description: Defines the next state in case of Energy Limit event

paramInformation.label: Variation Instantaneous Power
paramInformation.description: Defines the percentage variation of instantaneous power

paramInformation.label: Report Time Frequency
paramInformation.description: Defines the time in minutes

paramInformation.label: Nominal Voltage
paramInformation.description: Defines the nominal voltage value in tenths of volts

paramInformation.label: Fall in Maximum Voltage
paramInformation.description: Defines, the nominal value for max voltage fall permitted

paramInformation.label: Electric Parameters
paramInformation.description: Defines which parameters will be subjected to notification

paramInformation.label: Voltage RMS Value
paramInformation.description: Reading of this parameter returns the value of voltage RMS

paramInformation.label: Current RMS Value
paramInformation.description: Returns the value of current RMS expressed in hundredths of Amperes.

paramInformation.label: Power Factor
paramInformation.description: Returns the value of power factor as a percentage

paramInformation.label: Total Energy Consumed
paramInformation.description: Returns the value of total energy consumed expressed in Wh (thousandths of KWh).

paramInformation.label: Total Energy Produced
paramInformation.description: Returns the value of total energy consumed expressed in Wh (thousandths of KWh).

paramInformation.label: Start-Up Status
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of the device following a restart.

options.label: Previous status: Status prior to restart

paramInformation.label: Configuration Reset
paramInformation.description: Defines which parameters should be reset to default values.

paramInformation.label: Type of External Switch
paramInformation.description: Defines the type of external switch connected to the device.

paramInformation.label: Load Control
paramInformation.description: Defines the load control mode
